attributes.action: Create stronger tests to test prospective policemen and PCOs in terms of violence and bullying. and to remove policemen and PCOs that are reported more than five time from the force.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many times I have come across policemen of PCOs that use their power to intimidate, or even threaten people for no good reason. This petition is set up to prevent THESE policemen and PCOs from entering the police force, by creating exams that test the cadets stress control, and how aggressive they are, and for PCOs and policemen that get more than five complaints on violence or bullying to be removed from the force.
